channel.title: netflix on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in netflix on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-27
item.description: Netflix is reportedly developing a live-action Pokémon series (2 minute read) Netflix is in the early stages of developing a live-action Pokémon TV series.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-15
item.description: Amazon bought Facebook’s satellite team to help build its Starlink competitor (3 minute read) Amazon has purchased Facebook’s small-satellite division.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-29
item.description: Netflix’s new ‘Play Something’ shuffle feature is here to solve your movie night indecision (1 minute read) Play Something is a new feature for Netflix that automatically suggests new shows and movies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-12
item.description: Netflix Begins Test to Crack Down on Password Sharing Outside Your Household (2 minute read) Some Netflix TV users have started seeing a notification prompting them to get their own accounts if they don’t live with the owner of the account.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-15
item.description: Apple Fitness+ tidbits (4 minute read) Apple’s Fitness+ is now available.
